title: London AI & Data Science Summit
description: The premier London summit for AI and Data Science professionals. Featuring keynotes from industry leaders, technical workshops, and networking opportunities. Held at the Barbican Centre.

title: Edinburgh Fintech Forum
description: Scotland's leading Fintech forum in Edinburgh. Explore the latest trends in financial technology, blockchain, and digital banking. Hosted at the Edinburgh International Conference Centre.

title: Bristol Cybersecurity Conference
description: Bristol's annual conference focusing on Cybersecurity threats and solutions. Featuring workshops, expert panels, and industry exhibitions. Held at the Ashton Gate Stadium.

title: Cardiff Software Development Conference
description: Wales' premier Software Development Conference in Cardiff. Covering agile, DevOps, and the latest programming languages and frameworks. At the Motorpoint Arena Cardiff.

title: Glasgow Green Tech Innovation Forum
description: Glasgow's Green Tech Innovation Forum, showcasing sustainable technologies, renewable energy, and environmental solutions. At the Scottish Event Campus (SEC).

title: Taste of London Food Festival
description: London's most delicious food festival! Taste dishes from top restaurants, see chef demos, and enjoy live music in Regent's Park. A culinary experience not to be missed.

title: Great British Cheese Festival, Cheltenham
description: A celebration of British cheese in Cheltenham. Sample cheeses from artisan producers across the UK, attend cheese-making workshops, and enjoy local food and drink.

title: Edinburgh Coffee Festival
description: A celebration of coffee culture in Edinburgh. Featuring artisan coffee roasters, barista workshops, coffee tastings, and street food. Held at the Assembly Roxy.

title: Birmingham Chocolate Festival
description: Indulge in all things chocolate at the Birmingham Chocolate Festival. Featuring chocolatiers, workshops, tastings, and chocolate-themed treats. At the Custard Factory.

title: Birmingham Chocolate Festival
description: Indulge in all things chocolate at the Birmingham Chocolate Festival. Featuring chocolatiers, workshops, tastings, and chocolate-themed treats. At the Custard Factory.

title: Vegan Food Festival UK, London
description: The UK's largest vegan food festival in London. Featuring plant-based food stalls, vegan cooking demos, ethical fashion, and cruelty-free products. At the Olympia London.

title: Leeds Indie Music Fest
description: Celebrate emerging indie talent from across the UK. Three days of live performances, artist Q&As, and music industry workshops at Leeds First Direct Arena.

title: Manchester Electronic Music Weekend
description: Experience cutting-edge electronic music across multiple venues in Manchester's Northern Quarter. Featuring DJ sets, production masterclasses, and immersive sound installations.

title: Cambridge Folk Festival
description: Annual celebration of folk traditions at Cherry Hinton Hall. Enjoy acoustic performances, instrument workshops, and family-friendly activities in a historic setting.

title: Bristol Half Marathon
description: Run through historic Bristol streets in this annual race. Choose from half marathon, 10K, or family fun run distances. Starting at Bristol Harbourside.

title: Midlands Open Basketball Tournament
description: Competitive basketball tournament for amateur teams at Birmingham's Utilita Arena. Youth and adult divisions available with coaching clinics.

title: Cornwall Surf Open
description: Professional and amateur surfing competition at Fistral Beach. Includes beach yoga sessions, surfboard demos, and coastal conservation workshops.

title: Glasgow Street Art Festival
description: Transform Glasgow's Merchant City with live mural painting, graffiti workshops, and urban art tours. Collaborate with international street artists.

title: Liverpool Biennial of Sculpture
description: Open-air sculpture exhibition along Liverpool's waterfront. Features installations from UK artists and interactive kinetic art displays.

title: York Medieval Theatre Festival
description: Open-air performances of medieval mystery plays in York's historic streets. Features period costumes, traditional music, and artisan craft markets.

title: London Startup Summit
description: Annual gathering for UK startups at Excel London. Features pitch competitions, investor meetups, and growth strategy workshops.

title: Edinburgh Sustainable Business Conference
description: Explore green business practices and circular economy models at the EICC. Networking sessions with B Corp certified companies.

title: Leeds Digital Marketing Expo
description: UK's largest northern marketing conference at Leeds Royal Armouries. Focus on SEO, social media trends, and content strategy.

title: Oxford Literary Festival Weekend
description: Book lovers' event at Oxford Town Hall. Author talks, writing masterclasses, and publishing industry panels.

title: Brighton Code Academy Bootcamp
description: Weekend intensive coding workshop at Brighton Dome. Learn Python, web development, and data visualisation basics.

title: Newcastle Teachers' Innovation Conference
description: Professional development event for educators at Northumbria University. Focus on EdTech, inclusive teaching, and curriculum design.

title: Sheffield Community Green Initiative
description: City-wide volunteering day improving green spaces. Tree planting, park cleanups, and urban gardening workshops across Sheffield.

title: Belfast Community Kitchen Festival
description: Celebrate local food traditions with cooking demonstrations and communal meals at St George's Market. Free entry with optional donations.

title: Cardiff Neighbourhood Arts Festival
description: Showcasing local talent through street performances, pop-up galleries, and community choir concerts in Cardiff Bay.

title: Bath Hot Air Balloon Fiesta
description: Spectacular display of colourful hot air balloons over the Bath countryside. Night glow events and tethered rides available.

title: Norwich Puzzle Championship
description: Unique problem-solving competition featuring escape rooms, cryptic quizzes, and giant outdoor puzzles at Norwich Castle grounds.

title: Inverness Storytelling Festival
description: Celebration of Scottish oral traditions with ceilidh tales, mythic reenactments, and wilderness storytelling sessions by Loch Ness.
